title: Ontology-Enhanced Education Using Rule-Based Instructional Design Support Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: For professionals: Strengthening competencies in designing and validating rule-based pedagogical approaches using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can express instructional design theories as ontologies using OWL/SWRL.
Learners can verify the compatibility of learning design and theory with over 70% accuracy using rule-based tools.
Learners can explore and apply context-specific instructional design methods through an ontology-based system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
